AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that signed proposed orders and made findings regarding the ends of justice for granting continuances
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant who, along with Zeba Williams, requested continuances due to inadequate preparation time under the Speedy Trial Act
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: co-defendant with Ramon De La Cruz, whose counsel articulated reasons for needing more time to prepare for trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: federal law governing trial timing, which was considered by the United States District Court in granting continuances
